experience: You and Katherine both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Mark Goldstein, and 77 others
Leaders who know what they stand for are more focused, passionate, and inspiring to others. They think, act, and communicate from their WHY.

I'm excited to share that our team will be hosting a "Speak Like a Leader" workshop in NYC in November. I am extremely passionate about this course that we created with renowned Broadway acting coach, Jen Waldman.
Join our team to discover and articulate your WHY, and learn to share your vision in a way that inspires people to take action. Apply by October 30 at  http://bit.ly/2yzDeHP.
Anxiously Counting down the last few days to my opening keynote at the 2017 National Diversity Women’s Business Leadership Conference at the Gaylord Resort, National Harbor, MD on Thursday morning.
My Topic will be: “The New Tech Evolution: Ensuring Women Have an Equal Voice.”
Very Exciting! Have a few immersive tech experience surprises for the audience.
Apple cofounder Steve Wozniak just launched a new startup to reinvent tech-industry training

recommendations: Katherine’s experienced resume speaks for itself. Through proven performance, her career progression has been filled with tangible, positive results, a demonstration strong business savvy tendancies, loyalty to the organization, commitment to her peers and leadership while leading in a calming, servant discerning style. What has made Katherine unique is her ability to create an environment that focuses not only on the “job,” but on the whole person. Through servant leadership coupled with looking at situations and life in a holistic manner, Katherine connects with individuals and organizations at a deeper level. Katherine brings life balance principles into the work environment that improves employee performance and a sense of belonging and personal value in their organization.

March 31, 2015, Debra reported directly to Katherine

Katherine is a collaborative and highly effective leader with solid strategic insight, organizational agility and a demonstrated track record in achieving desired operational outcomes. During my time with Katherine at Apollo Education Group, I was constantly amazed at her ability to process complex business issues quickly and derive scalable and efficient solutions that provided sustainable results. She has a passion for staff development and has earned a high level of respect and trust across all levels of the organization, from executive management to direct reports and cross-functional stakeholders. Katherine tackles each challenge with a positive entrepreneurial approach and her genuine collaborative nature inspires creativity and engagement at every point. She is a savvy business partner with a proven track record in providing innovative solutions, as well as developing top-performance teams to achieve record breaking results. Those who know and have the opportunity to work with Katherine are positively influenced by her contagious optimistic outlook, her drive for excellence and her empowering leadership style.Debra BarcuchStrategy, Partnership Development and Talent Optimization

Katherine has a keen eye for process improvement and is highly organized, able to manage multiple disparate projects and initiatives simultaneously. As a peer and colleague of mine for more than 6 years, I worked closely with Katherine as she led teams ranging from marketing to client contracts to professional development and career services for a large national enterprise. She always demonstrated deep institutional knowledge and a genuine passion for creating team cultures marked by ingenuity, creativity and personal development. Katherine's broad background of sales, management and operations leadership make her well-rounded. Her commitment, work ethic and loyalty make her invaluable.

January 20, 2015, A worked with Katherine in different groups

Katherine led the creation of a large, diverse and important group during the time I knew her at Apollo Group and University of Phoenix.  In her leadership of the Professional Development Services for B2B enterprise, she had to mastermind the proper elements of structure and training, and then guide the ongoing optimization of performance.  She was a particularly supportive partner in the relaunch and development of the professional development business -- always ready to find a creative solution to problems and to bring her team in as well.  As a result, we were able to significantly raise the performance and profile of professional services within the organization so that it became a core element of the current corporate growth plan.  She's a great cross-functional partner to have.

October 5, 2015, Katherine was a client of Jonathan’s

'Ridiculously efficient and full of compassion’ is the phrase that comes to mind when I think about Jonathan and team at Hopscratch. I had the pleasure of working with Hopscratch when I started my business, Blissential. Jonathan and team were eager to support me as an entrepreneur so I could get started quickly and easily. Their expertise is industry agnostic yet geared to your specific needs as a business owner. As a soon to be business owner, you can't imagine all the things that you need to consider with setting up, yet wIth Hopscratch, I was able to get every foundational license and program that I needed so I could stay focused on the vision. Jonathan and his team have assembled a 'business in a box' and they made the whole process so seamless from effortless logistics to powerful tools. Every person on the Hopscratch team was incredibly accommodating and fun to work with and I highly recommend Hopscratch and their methodology. If you are thinking about starting a business, do yourself a favor and reach out to Hopscratch immediately!

Jason and I have worked closely together for the past 6 years in a peer capacity. During this time I had the opportunity to witness Jason demonstrate integrity and trustworthiness through his leadership and working style. He has a natural ability and candor to influence and affect people in a positive way. Jason has a strong presence and public speaking ability and he has led various departments and teams with these skills coupled with his strategic attention to detail. His dedication to clients and people always stands out as defining characteristics. Jason is collaborative and goal-oriented with an  eye to efficiency. Jason always thrives in challenges and change and always leads with consistency.  He is a savvy business partner with an innovative approach to client needs.  Jason has a desire for guiding staff development and driving top performing teams to attain results.  Those who work with Jason know he is an inspiring, creative and overall a great cross-functional team player and partner.
